videoData.title: The future of reading. It's fast
videoData.socialTitle: The future of reading. It's fast

nodes.whoTheyAre: Head of Quantextual Research at State Street Global Exchange, Stephen Lawrence has built his career around helping people understand research quickly and efficiently. At State Street, he oversees the development and execution of research aggregation by blending machine learning and big data with the contextual knowledge of human insight and oversight. His team’s “Idea Lab” helps summarize a wide range of research, including academic and sell-side research.

videoData.description: Does anyone actually read research reports? Stephen Lawrence found that most research in the finance industry rarely gets a glance beyond the front page. Lawrence has dedicated his career to making research reports more digestible, using a refined mixture of machine learning, big data and good old-fashioned human insight.
